item.title: Data recovery from a HDD killed by power surge
item.description: A story about how non-backed up data was rescued from oblivion and in the nick of time.
item.dc:creator: James Nzomo

item.title: Linux network interface naming
item.description: About how net-if's get their names - from kernel only naming to biosdevname and systemd-udev schemes.
item.dc:creator: James Nzomo

item.title: Setting up a repo cache with NGINX
item.description: A simple how to on setting up a linux package manager repo cache for those situations where a full blown mirror would be simply overkill.
item.dc:creator: James Nzomo

item.title: TEST POST
item.description: A simple test post...complete with a PAL test pattern and an annoying complementary 1KHz tone - just for your ears.
item.dc:creator: James Nzomo
